application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Conifer in rear garden - Lift lower canopy to height of 3m.G1 Mixed shrubs in rear garden - Trim to tidy, ensuring clearance from path.T2 Stump in rear garden - Remove from base of Pine.T3 Pine in rear garden - Reduce lateral growth over shed by removing up to 3m in branch length.G2 Conifers in rear garden - Trim overhang away from shed by removing up to 2m in branch length.T4 Conifer in rear garden - Remove branch growing through Laurel.T5 Conifer in rear garden - Remove lowest branches.T6 Conifer in rear garden - Cut back overhang from neighbouring property.T7 Conifer in rear garden - Remove Holly from base and remove lowest branch. Sever ivy at base.G3 Conifer x3 in rear garden - Trim to tidy.G4 Hornbeam in rear garden - Reduce height down to scaffold.G5 Wisteria in rear garden - Thin out crown and remove from drainpipe.H1 Conifer & Bay in front garden - Trim to tidy.H2 Conifer & Privet in front garden - Trim to tidy.
